column5: na menkyerɛ wo; Osiandɛ mowɔ asɛm bi so ka wɔ Nyankopɔn afamu."

column3: Na mebu mo Bɔfo no bem."
me nsɛm nnyɛ akɔhwi: Obi a odzi mu wɔ nyimdzee mu nye wo wɔ hɔ."
Nyankopɔn yɛ Ɔkɛse na ommbu obiara enyimtsia; Ɔyɛ katakyi wɔ ntseasee ahoɔdzen mu."

column2: "Ɔnnkora ndzebɔnyɛfo hɔn nkwa do: Mbom ɔdze ahohiahiafo bem ma hɔn."
"Onnyi n’enyiwa mmfi atseneneefo do: Mbom ɔma wɔnye ahemfo tsena ahengua do
column3: Na ɔma wɔtsena do daa

column2: "Na sɛ wogu hɔn wɔ mpokyerɛ mu
column3: Na wɔdze ahohiahia ahoma kyekyer hɔn a;"
Na hɔn mbrato

column2: "Obue hɔn aso so dze ma nkyerɛkyerɛ
column3: Na ɔhyɛ dɛ wɔnsan mfi emumuyɛ mu."
Wobedzi hɔn nda wɔ prɔmprɔmyɛ mu
column4: Na hɔn mfe so wɔ enyigye mu."

column3: wɔbɔtotɔ wɔ afona ano

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔyɛ akoma mu ennsuronyamefo boaboa ebufuw ano: Sɛ ɔkyekyer hɔn a
column3: wonnsu mmfrɛ mboa."
Na wɔhwer hɔn nkwa wɔ ahoɔfifo mu."
Na obue hɔn aso wɔ atseetsee mu."

column2: "Nkyɛ ɔpɛ dɛ ɔgye ɔwo so fi ahohia mu Kɔ bea tɛtɛr bi do
column3: mbrɛ ahokyer nnyi hɔ; Na seradze ayɛ wo pon do edziban no ma."

column2: "Naaso ndzebɔnyɛfo atsɛmbu ahyɛ wo ma: Atsɛmbu na pɛrpɛr esuo wo mu dzendzenndzen."

column3: hwɛ yie ɔno bɛyɛ na w’ahonya egya wo kɔ; Nkyii so mma mma mpatadze ne kɛseyɛ nndan wo mmfa nkyɛn."
dɛ ɔwo nnkɔkɔ ahohia mu
Dɛ ɔmbɛpra aman mfi hɔn ananmu."
mma nngye emumuyɛ enyi: Na iyi na ɔwo w’enyi gye ho sen ahohiahia."
Nyankopɔn yɛ no tum mu akɛsedze: Woana na ɔyɛ ɔkyerɛkyerɛfo tse dɛ ɔno?"

column2: "Woana na ɔdze no kwan ahyɛ no do? Anaa woana botum ase dɛ
column3: Ɔwo ayɛ emumuyɛ?"
Dza nyimpa atow ho ndwom no."

column2: "Nyimpa nyinara ahwɛ ara; Dasanyi hwɛ no ekyirekyir."

column3: Nyankopɔn so
column4: na yennyim no; Ne mfe no dodow nnyi nhwehwɛmu."

column2: "Na ɔno na ɔtwe nsu atɔw atɔw a Ofi n’ehubɔhubɔw mu sosɔw tɔ nyankom:"
"Dza wimu hue gu famu Na ɔsosɔw gu nyimpa do pii no."

column3: ana obi botum atse mununkum ne ntserɛwmu ase
ɔtserɛw ne kan mu; Na ɔkata po n’ase do."

column2: "Na ɔnam yinom do na obu aman atsɛn; Ɔno na ɔdze edziban piigyan ma."
"Ɔdze enyinam katakata ne nsa ho; Na ɔhyɛ ne mbra ma ɔtow bɔ botae no."
"No mbobɔmu no ka ne mbae no ho asɛm
column3: Mbowakuw so ka asɛm wɔ ehum a ɔreba ho."
